title: M2: Translation Memory
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 10 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: Remember to distinguish between a "translation memory" (which consists of bilingual data aligned at segment level) and a "translation memory tool" (which is used to create, update and manage the translation memory). Translation memory tools may be offered as part of a more complex "translation environment" or "translation management system", in which other tools are also made available to the translator. More advanced translation students should also learn about such environments.
